Package ch.decent.sdk.crypto

Class Passphrase.Companion

  • ch.decent.sdk.crypto.Passphrase.Companion
  • Enclosing class:
    Passphrase

    public static class Passphrase.Companion

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Passphrase generate(java.util.List<java.lang.String> seed, int count, boolean normalize)
      If parameter normalize is true, all provided word will be converted to upper case before entropy creation. In other case word stays as it was provided.
      Passphrase generate(java.util.List<java.lang.String> seed, int count)
      If parameter normalize is true, all provided word will be converted to upper case before entropy creation. In other case word stays as it was provided.
      Passphrase generate(java.util.List<java.lang.String> seed)
      If parameter normalize is true, all provided word will be converted to upper case before entropy creation. In other case word stays as it was provided.
      Passphrase generate()
      If parameter normalize is true, all provided word will be converted to upper case before entropy creation. In other case word stays as it was provided.

    • Method Detail

      • generate

        public Passphrase generate(java.util.List<java.lang.String> seed,
                           int count,
                           boolean normalize)

        If parameter normalize is true, all provided word will be converted to upper case before entropy creation. In other case word stays as it was provided.

        Parameters:
        seed - words list
        count - word count, default 16
        normalize - normalization flag, default true

      • generate

        public Passphrase generate(java.util.List<java.lang.String> seed,
                           int count)

        If parameter normalize is true, all provided word will be converted to upper case before entropy creation. In other case word stays as it was provided.

        Parameters:
        seed - words list
        count - word count, default 16

      • generate

        public Passphrase generate(java.util.List<java.lang.String> seed)

        If parameter normalize is true, all provided word will be converted to upper case before entropy creation. In other case word stays as it was provided.

        Parameters:
        seed - words list

      • generate

        public Passphrase generate()

        If parameter normalize is true, all provided word will be converted to upper case before entropy creation. In other case word stays as it was provided.
